concept.title: Creating Your First Expand/Collapse Section
concept.shortdesc: In this section, you will create your first expand/collapse section using the &ePEX; Trial source documents and stationery.

conbody.p:
expand/collapse sections creating
The previous section described the steps involved in implementing expand/collapse in the Sample Stationery. In this section, the steps for impolementing expand/collapse sections in your own DITA documents.
